#summary validatesInclusionOf(property,list[message,when,allowBlank])
#labels api,0.9

*Category*:

[ModelInitializationFunctions Model Initialization Functions]

*Description*:

Validates that the value of the specified property exists in the supplied list.

*Return Type*:

Void

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

|| *Name* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *property* || string || true || - || See documentation for `validatesExclusionOf` ||
|| *list* || string || true || - || List of allowed values ||
|| *message* || string || false ||   || See documentation for `validatesExclusionOf` ||
|| *when* || string || false || onSave || See documentation for `validatesExclusionOf` ||
|| *allowBlank* || boolean || false || false || See documentation for `validatesExclusionOf` ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- in models/User.cfc --->
<cffunction name="init">
  <cfset validatesInclusionOf(property="frameworkOfChoice", list="wheels,rails", message="Please try again and this time select a decent framework.")>
</cffunction>
}}}
